result.eng: He put all he had in his pocket.
result.ga: chuir sé gach a raibh aige ina phóca
result.orig: chuir sé gach a raibh aige ina phóca
result.html: chuir sé gach a raibh aige ina phócaHe put all he had in his pocket.
result.ponchtml: ċuir sé gaċ a raiḃ aige ina ṗócaHe put all he had in his pocket.

result.ga: cuir i do phóca é
result.orig: cuir i do phóca é
result.html: cuir i do phóca éPut in your pocket.
result.ponchtml: cuir i do ṗóca éPut in your pocket.

result.eng: He took a knife out of his pocket.
result.ga: thóg sé scian amach as a phóca
result.orig: thóg sé scian amach as a phóca
result.html: thóg sé scian amach as a phócaHe took a knife out of his pocket.
result.ponchtml: ṫóg sé scian amaċ as a ṗócaHe took a knife out of his pocket.

result.eng: She has a talent for keeping money flowing from pocket to pocket.
result.ga: tá de bhua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeacht ó phóca go póca
result.orig: tá de bhua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeacht ó phóca go póca
result.html: tá de bhua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeacht ó phóca go pócaShe has a talent for keeping money flowing from pocket to pocket.
result.ponchtml: tá de ḃua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeaċt ó ṗóca go pócaShe has a talent for keeping money flowing from pocket to pocket.

result.eng: The envelope fell out of his pocket.
result.ga: thit an clúdach amach as a phóca
result.orig: thit an clúdach amach as a phóca
result.html: thit an clúdach amach as a phócaThe envelope fell out of his pocket.
result.ponchtml: ṫit an clúdaċ amaċ as a ṗócaThe envelope fell out of his pocket.

result.eng: They gave her some pocket money.
result.html: thug siad airgead póca diThey gave her some pocket money.
result.ponchtml: ṫug siad airgead póca diThey gave her some pocket money.
